short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extention allows you to define any word on the screen by highlighting it and then clicking on the chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that allows you to highlight a word on the page, click on my extension and get a definition of the word you have highlighted. The extension is connected to a dictionary database and uses a special algorithm to retrieve the highlighted text, query the database and retrieve the definition for you in an elegant, simple, and well designed chrome extension.
